attributes.action: Scrap tax credits and tax us less.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current Tax Credit legislation has done more harm than good. Why can't the government simply tax families less in the first place? I cannot see why the government have to take our money, mess around with it for a little and recycle it back to us through the expensive and error strewn tax credit system. 

It doesn't add any value, just adds concern to the low income families it is meant to benefit through a fear in an incorrect reward.

Scrap tax credits that hardly anyone understands, and implement a greater tax free allowance according to how many children you have.
